title: Finland, what is our promise for future generations?
content:
Foresight Friday 2025 brought together policymakers and global experts to discuss Finland’s long-term responsibilities to future generations and intergenerational fairness. The question remains open, and it belongs to all of us: what is our promise for future generations?
The post Finland, what is our promise for future generations?  appeared first on Demos Helsinki.
creator: demoshelsinki

title: Initial comments on the European Commission’s Affordable Housing Plan
content:
Housing must be made affordable while protecting the ecological systems on which we all depend. The EU could lead this transformation but it requires new ways of thinking about policy, governance, and action.
The post Initial comments on the European Commission’s Affordable Housing Plan appeared first on Demos Helsinki.
creator: Angeliki Vourdakis
sourceDescription: A globally operating, independent think tank

title: Join us as a City Innovation Coach
content:
Join Demos Helsinki as a Senior City Innovation Coach supporting Nordic municipalities in Bloomberg Philanthropies’ i-team program. 
The post Join us as a City Innovation Coach appeared first on Demos Helsinki.

title: Doomed to grow or ready to transform?
content: Economic growth used to be a cause that had effects, and the desired and expected effects were a matter of political and public debate until the 1990s recession. The meanings and expectations towards growth changed over time, and the idea of economic growth evolved within the debates and the very varied perspectives to growth. Our report “Doomed to Grow” calls for acknowledging growth's historical
creator: Angeliki Vourdakis
sourceDescription: A globally operating, independent think tank

title: 20 years of trying
content:
For 20 years, we have been fighting for a fair, sustainable, and joyful next era. These are the beginnings of our journey.
The post 20 years of trying appeared first on Demos Helsinki.
creator: Ly Le
sourceDescription: A globally operating, independent think tank

title: Europe’s democratic resilience requires introspection, clear-sightedness and reimagination
content:
The European Democracy Shield (EUDS) is being prepared to bolster the continent’s democratic resilience. If it isn’t to become one of innumerable democracy initiatives, EU institutions need to be clear-sighted about the causes and stakes of our present moment.
The post Europe’s democratic resilience requires introspection, clear-sightedness and reimagination appeared first on Demos Helsinki.
creator: Sara Pynttäri
sourceDescription: A globally operating, independent think tank

title: Imaginaries on Sustainability Transformation – Report outlines three positive futures
content: Imagining futures where society has successfully undergone a sustainability transformation helps us envision a world in which today’s major negative trends have been brought under control. But what kind of positive futures have been proposed in recent years? At the request of the Finnish Expert Panel for Sustainable Development, Demos Helsinki conducted a literature review and drafted three prelim

title: The anticipatory policy cycle: not just preparing for the future, but influencing it
content:
Governments that invest in foresight-driven policymaking are better positioned to shape the conditions that they operate in. This is how to build policies that both anticipate and influence the future. 
The post The anticipatory policy cycle: not just preparing for the future, but influencing it appeared first on Demos Helsinki.
creator: demoshelsinki

title: Innovating urban development: Lessons from M4EG & moving beyond growth
content:
Two key lessons from our work in the Mayors for Economic Growth project, in collaboration with UNDP Europe and Central Asia: 1) Innovation needs to occur at multiple levels and 2) If we're to be effective, we must remain humble.
The post Innovating urban development: Lessons from M4EG & moving beyond growth appeared first on Demos Helsinki.
creator: demoshelsinki
sourceDescription: A globally operating, independent think tank

title: Europe cannot simply build its way out of the housing crisis
content:
There is an anticipated challenge in housing that few are talking about yet. The conventional tool that cities have always had to address housing crises — building more — will not be sufficient. How prepared are cities for this scenario? More importantly, how can cities address housing justice while also averting ecological and biodiversity crises from worsening?

title: Kestävyysmurroksen tulevaisuuskuvat -selvitys luonnosteli kolme positiivista tulevaisuuskuvaa
content:
Tulevaisuuskuvat kestävyysmurroksen läpikäyneestä yhteiskunnasta auttavat meitä kuvittelemaan maailmaa, jossa aikamme suuret negatiiviset kehityskulutut on saatu hallintaan. Mutta millaisia positiivisia tulevaisuuskuvia aiheesta on viime vuosina julkaistu? Demos Helsinki kokosi Suomen kestävyyspaneelin pyynnöstä kirjallisuuskatsauksen ja luonnosteli kolme tulevaisuuskuvan aihiota.

creator: demoshelsinki

title: What’s going on with GDP? Rethinking economic success
content:
For decades, GDP has stood unchallenged as the primary measure of economic success. As calls to move beyond GDP grow, two approaches have risen to prominence: supplementing it with broader measures, or abandoning it altogether to redefine economic success. What is the best path forward in the debate on GDP?
The post What’s going on with GDP? Rethinking economic success appeared first on Demos Hels
creator: demoshelsinki
sourceDescription: A globally operating, independent think tank
